title: FuturesElite Check website
description: FuturesElite, based in Italy and established in November 2024, is a futures prop trading firm offering Instant and 1 Step program types. Supported platforms include Quantower, Volumetrica Trading, ATAS Orderflow Trading, Deepmap, and Deepcharts. Verified by our [Intelligence Hub](/) for prop trading excellence.
forbidden_strategies: Straddles/strangles to exploit news volatility prohibited.
Account Rolling: Aggressive purchasing of multiple challenges prohibited.
Hedging/Reverse Trading across different users/accounts prohibited.
Placing multiple limit orders at same price for manipulation prohibited.
DCA allowed but not as primary strategy.

payout_policy.minimum_payout: No minimum on RISE, $500 on Crypto.
payout_policy.details: 95% profit split (Instant/Prime/Elite). 100% split on first $10k (Live). Instant requires 7 winning days with min PnL milestones ($100-$350). Prime/Elite require 5 winning days with profit goals ($2k-$4.5k) and payout caps ($1.3k-$5k).

firm_rules.copy_trading: Allowed between own accounts; prohibited from others.
firm_rules.news_trading: Funded/Instant: positions must be closed 2 mins before/after Tier 1 news (total 6 min restriction). Customizable add-on available.
firm_rules.weekend_holding: Not allowed. All trades must be closed by 4:59 PM EST daily.
forbidden_strategies: Straddles/strangles to exploit news volatility prohibited.
Account Rolling: Aggressive purchasing of multiple challenges prohibited.
Hedging/Reverse Trading across different users/accounts prohibited.
Placing multiple limit orders at same price for manipulation prohibited.
DCA allowed but not as primary strategy.

seo_content:
FuturesElite Technical Infrastructure

FuturesElite, based in Italy and established in November 2024, is a futures prop trading firm offering Instant and 1 Step program types. Supported platforms include Quantower, Volumetrica Trading, ATAS Orderflow Trading, Deepmap, and Deepcharts. Verified by our [Intelligence Hub](/) for prop trading excellence.

youtube_metadata.title: FuturesElite Full Report: Leverage, Rules & Payouts
youtube_metadata.description: Complete technical breakdown of FuturesElite. We analyze their futures environment and execution rules.
